name: Reloading!
text: Can be used by sending 1 or 2 FIRE monster(s) from your hand to your Graveyard while you control a "Blaze Accelerator" card. Choose "Volcanic" monster(s) from your Deck equal to the number of cards you sent from your hand to the Graveyard, and send them to your Graveyard. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
